New York Tourism

Some time spent reviewing the old, new and classic things about New York. Featuring a gallery of some of the images that I took while I was there and thoughts about whether all the tourist attractions that I visited are really worth the hype they get by visitors.

Welcome To New York

A diary entry from my time in New York City during New Years eve. I begin to think about what it's like to finally be in the city that I dreamed about for so long and whether it's going to be all I ever imagined.

Berkeley at Night

Mid Year Journal

When presented with a task that comes down to summing up 17 weeks of, frankly, chaos, I've spent too much time thinking about this before I could even begin to write about it all. I spent some time trying to think sum up my time so far in California, what it's like to be an exchange student and review some of the lessons that Berkeley has taught me.
